channel.title: Forum notification for developers
channel.description:
[quote="nrgaway, post:1, topic:1083"]I don't get notifications of topics, so maybe create a task if this not complete[/quote]
Is this on purpose? Could you fix that please?
Every thread has a notify button.
Every board has a notify button.
The forum / server mailer works reliably.

item.title: Forum notification for developers
item.dc:creator: nrgaway
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:1, topic:1084”][quote author=nrgaway link=topic=1228.msg8161#msg8161 date=1431719288]
I don’t get notifications of topics, so maybe create a task if this not complete
[/quote]

Is this on purpose? Could you fix that please?

Every thread has a notify button.

Every board has a notify button.

The forum / server mailer works reliably.[/quote]

I dunno what the issue is. I primarily use web based gmail and I have added filters to grab whonix stuff, but it still often gets dispersed between spam and the other topics when its all supposed to end up in one folder.

I get over 200 messages a day so its hard to be checking for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum notification for developers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Is Whonix 11 using systemd functions in bash, python scripts?

I don’t get notifications of topics, so maybe create a task if this not complete

Is this on purpose? Could you fix that please?

Every thread has a notify button.

Every board has a notify button.

The forum / server mailer works reliably.

Read full topic
